resources.string:
" 1. Menu Button: Return to main menu.
" "2. Octave Selector: Slide left for lower pitch notes, right for higher ones.
" "3. Record Button: Press the button to start recording, it will turn red. Press again to stop.
" " NOTE:Recording automatically saves when recording stops, and overwrites
" " any previous recordings!
" "4. Restart Button: Restart the playback of the selected recording.
" "5. Play Button: Play the selected recording.
" "6. Pause Button: Stop the current playback.
" "7. Help Button: Use this button to return to this screen.
" "8. Keyboard Keys: Press the keys to make sounds."
